work.summary: Retained to develop and implement eCommerce and corporate sites to enable clients to market products and services, launch brands, and achieve continued growth.
highlights: Collaborated with business stakeholders to analyze needs for the development of technology solutions.
Designed, developed, tested, and delivered web-based applications leveraging React, Redux, CSS3, Python, Django, and WordPress technologies.

work.position: Business Analyst / Guest Support Technical Specialist
work.summary: Built an impressive record of achievements for this multinational mass media and entertainment conglomerate. Originally recruited as a pilot for the Monorail Department and transitioned as a Guest Support Technical Specialist for the Photo Imaging Department. Evolved as a Business Analyst within the Photo Imaging Department.
highlights: Interfaced with development team to define the functionality for the Main Agent Interaction Platform.
Created tools that reduced customer service satisfaction metrics and improved productivity.
Founded team that enhanced peer-to-peer development.
